messages.content: You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer international shipping?
Currently, ComfortLiving only ships within the United States.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Are there any care instructions for ComfortLiving wooden furniture?
Yes, we recommend dusting wooden furniture regularly and using a quality furniture polish to maintain its finish.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What is the best way to arrange ComfortLiving furniture in a small space?
Our design consultants can provide tips and suggestions for arranging furniture in small spaces to maximize functionality and style.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving have a loyalty program?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers a loyalty program where customers can earn points on purchases and redeem them for discounts.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied with my ComfortLiving purchase?
Yes, if you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a full refund.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Are there any special care instructions for ComfortLiving leather furniture?
We recommend using a leather conditioner to keep your ComfortLiving leather furniture soft and supple.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer bulk purchase discounts?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers discounts on bulk purchases for businesses and large orders.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What is ComfortLiving's price match policy?
ComfortLiving will match the price of identical items found at lower prices from authorized retailers.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
How can I find the nearest ComfortLiving store?
You can use the store locator feature on our website to find the nearest ComfortLiving store.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving offer any services for moving and relocating furniture?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers moving and relocation services for an additional fee.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What should I do if my ComfortLiving furniture arrives damaged?
If your furniture arrives damaged, please contact our customer service immediately for assistance.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Does ComfortLiving sell replacement cushions?
Yes, replacement cushions for ComfortLiving furniture can be ordered through our customer service department.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Can I customize the size of ComfortLiving furniture?
Some ComfortLiving furniture items can be customized in size. Please contact our customer service for more details.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Are ComfortLiving products available for wholesale?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers wholesale options for retailers and businesses. Please contact our sales department for more information.

Does ComfortLiving offer any eco-friendly furniture options?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers a selection of eco-friendly furniture made from sustainable materials.

What are ComfortLiving's store hours?
Store hours vary by location. Please check our website or contact your local store for specific hours.

How can I stay updated on new ComfortLiving products?
You can stay updated on new products by subscribing to our newsletter or following us on social media.

Does ComfortLiving offer outdoor furniture?
Yes, ComfortLiving offers a range of outdoor furniture including patio sets, loungers, and garden tables.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What is ComfortLiving's policy on pet damage?
ComfortLiving does not cover pet damage under its warranty. We recommend using protective covers if you have pets.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
Can I find ComfortLiving furniture in department stores?
ComfortLiving furniture is exclusively available through our website and retail locations.

Does ComfortLiving provide furniture for commercial spaces?
Yes, ComfortLiving provides furniture solutions for commercial spaces, including offices and hotels.

What is the average lifespan of ComfortLiving furniture?
The average lifespan of ComfortLiving furniture varies by usage, but with proper care, our furniture can last many years.

Does ComfortLiving offer same-day delivery?
Same-day delivery is available in select areas for an additional fee. Please check availability during checkout.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
How do I leave a review for a ComfortLiving product?
You can leave a review on our website by navigating to the product page and submitting your feedback.
You are a smart assistant answer the clients questions about our products.
What makes ComfortLiving different from other furniture brands?
ComfortLiving stands out for its commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction, offering stylish and durable furniture at competitive prices.
